description.original: A media slider for images, gifs, audios, videos, and PDFs.
description.translation: 用于图像、gif、音频、视频和 PDF 的媒体滑块。

dict..log(\"Loading Media Slider Plugin...\"): .log("正在加载 Media Slider 插件...")
dict..log(\"No media-slider code block replac: .log("未替换Media Slider代码块。可能没有找到或存在多个块。")
dict..log(\"Copied markdown link to clipboard: .log("已将 markdown 链接复制到剪贴板:", markdownLink)
dict.text: \"No valid media files found.\": text: "未找到有效的媒体文件。"
dict..setDesc(\"Folder to save pasted images: .setDesc("使用自定义选项时保存粘贴图像的文件夹")
dict..error(\"Error creating pasted image fil: .error("创建粘贴的图像文件时出错:", error)
dict..error(\"File not found in vault:\", fil: .error("在 Vault 中找不到文件:", fileName)
dict..error(\"Failed to parse media-slider me: .error("无法解析媒体滑块元数据:", error)
dict..error(\"Failed to copy markdown link:\": .error("复制 Markdown 链接失败:", err)
dict..setDesc(\"Toggle to enable drawing anno: .setDesc("切换以启用滑块上的绘图注释 (default: off)")
dict..setDesc(\"Toggle to enable wave-like vi: .setDesc("切换以启用音频/视频播放的波浪式可视化。")
dict..setDesc(\"CSS color value for the visua: .setDesc("可视化工具波形的 CSS 颜色值。")
dict..setDesc(\"Set the image compression qua: .setDesc("设置图像压缩质量 (0 to 1, e.g., 0.7 for 70% quality).")
